title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Sport, and Number of players in millions in each Sport on the y axis.
The highest category is found at League of Legends where Number of players in millions is 100.0.
Followed by 28.1 in Call of Duty.
The lowest category is found at StarCraft II where Number of players in millions is 2.4.
The highest value at League of Legends is almost 41.67 times larger than the minimum value of StarCraft II.
The highest value at League of Legends is almost 41.67 times larger than the minimum value of StarCraft II.
The difference between the max Sport League of Legends and min Sport StarCraft II is 97.6.
